Get Started

Quick Installation

pip install lithops

Basic Usage

from lithops import FunctionExecutor

def my_function(x):
    return x + 7

with FunctionExecutor() as fexec:
    future = fexec.call_async(my_function, 3)
    print(future.result())  # Prints 10
